description:
In the city of Ergastulum, a shady ville filled with made men and petty thieves, whores on the make and cops on the take, there are some deeds too dirty for even its jaded inhabitants to touch. Enter the "Handymen," Nic and Worick, who take care of the jobs no one else will handle. Until the day when a cop they know on the force requests their help in taking down a new gang muscling in on the territory of a top Mafia family. It seems like business (and mayhem) as usual, but the Handymen are about to find that this job is a lot more than they bargained for.

(Source: Anime News Network)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/go_kohske) | [Website](https://www.kohske-works.com/)

Freelance illustrator and author of two published short manga stories. Her first ongoing serial, GANGSTA., began in 2011. She currently resides in Hokkaido and owns a pet finch named Fumi.

On her Twitter account, Kohske notes that she has systemic lupus erythematosus. Due to complications from the disease, she has lost one eye and has paralysis in her fingers, as well as issues with her blood vessels and internal organs. Kohske is chronically ill and has frequent hospital visits, and because she prioritizes her health over her work, updates to GANGSTA. are irregular.

Started his career as an in-betweener for [Nakamura Production](https://anilist.co/studio/6658/Nakamura-Production) working on several outsourced episodes of [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/Sunrise) shows. 

He had his breakthrough as animator on [Yoroiden Samurai Troopers](https://anilist.co/anime/1264/) where his detailed art and animation attracted attention. He was thus selected to be character designer for the sequel, [Yoroiden Samurai Troopers Gaiden](https://anilist.co/anime/1265/), and later animation director for the [Mobile Suit Gundam F91](https://anilist.co/anime/88/) movie. 

Since then he's been heavily involved in Sunrise productions, both as animator and as character designer. Notable examples of his designs are those for [Mobile Suit Gundam Wing](https://anilist.co/anime/90/) and [Argento Soma](https://anilist.co/anime/285/).

He had his debut as a director with [Witch Hunter Robin](https://anilist.co/anime/7/), after which he directed the acclaimed [Ergo Proxy](https://anilist.co/anime/790/). More recent works of his include the adaptation of [Gangsta](https://anilist.co/anime/20773/), as well as the [Mobile Suit Gundam Hathaway](https://anilist.co/anime/105595/) trilogy.

__Notable works outside Anime:__

- Final Fantasy IX (Video Game, 2000) (Character Design)

Tsutchie (Real Name: Shinji Tsuchida) is a Japanese hip-hop producer. Originally the DJ/producer for the group ShakkaZombie, he has mostly done solo and collaboration work since then. He contributed to the soundtrack for the anime Samurai Champloo along with Force of Nature, Nujabes and Fat Jon.

__[Profile (Lantis)](http://www.lantis.jp/artist/stereodivefoundation/bio.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Stereo Dive Foundation__ is the solo sound making project of Japanese musician [Ryuuta Iida](https://anilist.co/staff/106037), otherwise known as Ron (stylized as R・O・N)

**Spouse:** [Shouichi Taguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/112059) (December 31, 2018-)

**[Website](http://annabel.jp/)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/A_nnabel)** | **[Tumblr](https://annabel-annabel.tumblr.com/)** | **[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/a_nnabel318/)**

**Introduction:**
Annabel is a Japanese-Argentine singer-songwriter signed under the company Lantis. In regards to her personal life, most of her information was unknown, until she revealed her real name via a letter to a famous radio station. Her real given name was revealed to be the same as her artist name, which is Annabel.

**Biography:**
She began her music career in 2005. In 2006, Annabel and singer [Nagi Yanagi (やなぎなぎ)](https://anilist.co/staff/109637/Nagi-Yanagi) formed the unit [Binaria](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3SkdXeqJHKFNXuaHvrj1pL?si=CZChqP69S3O6Dw0TBvdI_w), to date, they have released 13 albums. In 2007, she formed another unit with the singer Bermel.Inazawa called anNina. As anNina, the duo performed the ending themes to the second and third seasons of *[Higurashi: When They Cry](https://anilist.co/anime/934/Higurashi-no-Naku-Koro-ni/)*, respectively named *[Higurashi: When They Cry Kai](https://anilist.co/anime/1889/Higurashi-no-Naku-Koro-ni-Kai/)* and *[Higurashi: When They Cry Rei](https://anilist.co/anime/3652/Higurashi-no-Naku-Koro-ni-Rei/)*. In 2009, she started her solo career as a singer-songwriter, under the name Annabel.

Due to her rise in popularity, she started performing theme songs for the animation industry (anime series). Her first solo was "[Anamnesis](https://anidb.net/song/48723)", which was used as the ending theme to the 2012 anime TV series *[Another](https://anilist.co/anime/11111/Another)*, the single for "Anamnesis" was released on February 8, 2012. Annabel released her second single "[Above Your Hand](https://anidb.net/song/51660)" on May 23, 2012, which was used as the ending theme song for the anime TV series *[Sankarea](https://anilist.co/anime/11499/Sankarea)*. Her third single "[Signal Graph](https://anidb.net/song/52397)", was released on July 25, 2012, which was used as the opening theme for the anime TV series *[Love, Elections & Chocolate](https://anilist.co/anime/12175/Koi-to-Senkyo-to-Chocolate)*. She released her first solo album *[Miniascape](https://anidb.net/collection/8616)* on November 28, 2012.

In 2015, she sang the vocals for the theme song of the 3DS game, 7th Dragon III Code:VFD, from the 7th Dragon series.

In 2016, she formed the band siraph with Masayuki Hasuo and Masaaki Yamasaki (whom are former [School Food Punishment](https://anilist.co/staff/102508/School-Food-Punishment) members) and Yoshimasa Terui (from the band haisuinonasa) who were a member of her backup band.

(Source: [en.wikipedia.org](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Annabel_(Japanese_singer))
_Note: Not to be confused with the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/222835/)._
_Note: Not to be confused with the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/222835/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/daiki_fukuoka)

**Daiki Fukuoka** is a Japanese director, episode director, production manager and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuka_1106)

**Yuuka Sakurai** is a Japanese producer, animation planner and music producer working at Lantis. She is also director of music production at Bandai Namco Arts Inc. since April 1, 2018.

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.
**Hiroyasu Oyama** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.
